name: backend_server_url
label: WoodsPortal Admin URL
help_text: Paste the WoodsPortal Admin URL here

name: page_editor_preview_
label: Enable Dashboard Preview
inline_help_text: Please disable the preview before Publishing

name: add_home_tab
label: Enable Dashboard
help_text: Show the dashboard as the portal’s homepage with cards, dynamic content, and action buttons.

name: home
label: Dashboard
help_text: This is the landing page users see after logging in to the portal.

children.name: tab_name
children.label: Tab Name
children.help_text: Display name shown in the sidebar navigation menu.
children.validation_error_message: Use letters, numbers, and spaces only. Maximum 60 characters allowed.

children.name: icon_svg_code
children.label: Icon SVG Code
children.inline_help_text: You can search SVG Here and copy only the SVG start to end and paste it here.

children.name: enable_dashboard_cards
children.label: Enable Dashboard Cards
children.help_text: Display dynamic cards with rich text, CRM data, and optional action buttons.

children.name: show_title
children.label: Show Title
children.help_text: Display the card title.

children.name: title
children.label: Card Title
children.help_text: To insert dynamic values, wrap the internal property label in double asterisks (e.g., `**first_name**`). Copy labels from Contact Settings or Company Settings.

children.name: show_date
children.label: Display Date
children.help_text: Show the current date and time below the card title.

children.name: description
children.label: Description
children.help_text: Add rich text, images, or other content with support for dynamic contact and company data.
children.default:
Welcome to your Customer Portal Dashboard

Use this portal to manage support tickets and coordinate any custom work with our team.

children.name: properties
children.label: Display  Properties
children.help_text: Copy labels from Contact Settings or Company Settings and enable visibility in the admin panel.

children.name: properties_value
children.label: Property Internal Name
children.help_text: Copy labels from Contact Settings or Company Settings.

children.name: property_value_show_as
children.label: Display Value As
children.help_text: Display property value as text, a link, or a button that opens the URL in an iframe or a new tab.

children.name: on_click_action
children.label: On Click Action
children.help_text: Display property value as text, link, or a button that opens the URL in an iframe or new tab.

children.name: view
children.label: View
children.help_text: Choose how property data is displayed: inline with labels (List) or stacked vertically (Grid).

default.description:
Welcome to your Customer Portal Dashboard

Use this portal to manage support tickets and coordinate any custom work with our team.

children.name: view
children.label: View
children.help_text: Choose how property data is displayed: inline with labels (List) or stacked vertically (Grid).

children.name: tabs_data_type
children.label: Tab Visibility
children.help_text: Enable view/edit access for files, notes, and tickets in Contact Settings or Company Settings.

children.name: add_right_sidebar
children.label: Enable Right Sidebar
children.help_text: Displays HubSpot object records in a card-style layout. Hidden on mobile devices.

children.name: right_sidebar_object
children.label: Right Sidebar Objects
children.help_text: Select the HubSpot object whose records will show in the right sidebar.

children.name: list_object_name
children.label: Object Name
children.help_text: Set the title shown above the object cards in the sidebar.
children.validation_error_message: Use letters, numbers, and spaces only. Maximum 60 characters allowed.

children.name: object_type_id
children.label: Object Type ID
children.help_text:
Use the following IDs:
0-1 = Contacts
0-2 = Companies
0-3 = Deals
0-5 = Tickets
2-xxx = Custom Objects —
Copy custom IDs here.
children.inline_help_text: Visit here to view the complete list of Object Type IDs

children.name: mediator_object_type_id
children.label: Show Primary Company Associated Data
children.help_text: Show records linked to the user’s associated company. Enable the object association under Companies > Associations.

children.name: add_specific_pipeline
children.label: Filter By Pipeline
children.help_text: Display records from a specific pipeline of the selected object. Choose the object from the dropdown and ensure pipelines are enabled in Admin Settings.

children.name: pipeline_id
children.label: Pipeline Id
children.help_text: Enter the pipeline ID to filter the data.

children.name: show_iframe
children.label: Enable Iframe
children.help_text: Display the property as a clickable button if it contains a valid URL. The link opens in an iframe popup.

children.name: property_value_show_as
children.label: Display Value As
children.help_text: Display property value as text, a link, or a button that opens the URL in an iframe or a new tab.

children.name: on_click_action
children.label: On Click Action
children.help_text: Display property value as text, link, or a button that opens the URL in an iframe or new tab.

dashboard_cards.description:
Welcome to your Customer Portal Dashboard

Use this portal to manage support tickets and coordinate any custom work with our team.

name: menu_options
label: Menu Options
help_text: Manage the sidebar menu by selecting objects to display. Each menu item shows a table of records from that object.

children.label: Standard Objects
children.help_text: Display HubSpot standard objects in the portal menu. Configure objects here.

children.name: icon_svg_code
children.label: Icon SVG Code
children.help_text: Enter SVG icon code to display next to the tab name
children.inline_help_text: You can search SVG Here and copy only the SVG start to end and paste it here.
children.default: <svg      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"      viewBox="0 0 16 16"      width="1em"      height="1em"      {...props}    >      <path        fill="none"        stroke="currentColor"        strokeLinejoin="round"        d="M6 10h2.5c.55 0 1-.45 1-1s-.45-1-1-1h-1c-.55 0-1-.45-1-1s.45-1 1-1H10M8 4.5v1.167M8 9.5v2M13.5 5v8.5H3M2.5 11V2.5H12"      ></path>    </svg>
